subject: You're officially Superhuman ?
text:
----------
View image: (https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.BNPWZ3gCcPG5-h6IoRxOdrKCCjk26vpIuPnx4GDiBfWdCIBj5brxjn4fDSCSvnmFt-P1oC5BZk9c6ujy88DQwqI9POko8yhmx3KpExGxH1-DWMgcfdu7kDcpjgwPN_nUuiblwUQ-8WUzA1lC0sSmjKaEIj9XqDbqFNLJHXuQyKSBfLoUTULbL11tHSHv3X-JbbfIm3YgM1tk9E-CYPX3SR0n58JeEIjkQxwECH-2ZhR5mOlvmLIoMzXxF_Gc-iIAmLK6IIIi5yQ-FoAEyVIVUpIv6W14gqOxnfqx99Zdwj8/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t0/h001.AyBaBeDsD9RIrfKvIS1Rh_R29_H3mbkGBhDHvL23v-k
Caption: 

Hey ? [Zain](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.cbTlTBbOm0oxrOJrFZNEqc6jwbyUdOF1TTNAgEezYr40-oUpAS4uoVFtMleWbppD/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t1/h001.kN1Tosdt_2cecTAWh-PbJIZR7xkrsrGnT4keyIT5h7w here. Welcome to Superhuman!

You're probably here because you want to learn what?s happening in AI and how you can use it to your benefit.

That's what I'm here for! 

Think of me as your personal researcher: My team and I spend 100s of hours every week researching everything you need to know about AI. I?ll share the best bits with you in this short and insight-packed daily email.

To make sure you get all of my emails:

1. **Reply 'yes' to this email.**

2. If this email lands in your Spam or Promotions folder, **please move it to your 'Primary' inbox**. 

**If you don't do the above, you may not receive any of my emails.** Doing one of the above will let your email provider know that you want to receive my emails.




--------------------
### **Resources**

## **Learn how to use AI and get certified**

View image: (https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.BNPWZ3gCcPG5-h6IoRxOdrKCCjk26vpIuPnx4GDiBfWdCIBj5brxjn4fDSCSvnmFt-P1oC5BZk9c6ujy88DQwqI9POko8yhmx3KpExGxH1-DWMgcfdu7kDcpjgwPN_nUuiblwUQ-8WUzA1lC0sSmjILO2FnICSLXZR3xjszYzKs7dnccVEI9mfDgqCap0voCdlD0mxkqmLU2RwV40p9XzZJI0VNnmsdENxRyVeHDB9zoXobWSTF_RCDpega_kXGQ/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t2/h001.wYJg9ELRbXhAnknlnc66gMwtZDuRbZ6SGxI5YZwRvcM
Follow image link: (https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.tLO9pzLKcxr3ShVlu4P0Gqas-4_GK4TemjeqspXeWPG3lU5Am4FNe4HFBEaCd8XYcfH36peNE1nWiWNiLk_TT00u8OZFqj8QS9XydalIGj6BV12CSUSvytQstZOSWtVrw7pyew0eK1_ZptGjp9FzE1g9Bu6lIBK-Lni5prXvD0v2vGB2JWqGA5gez6R8TrXpmx6-1_DyiAjLaIo3kUaHgIxKLz4Rx9abWL7QYg16nr4flpreSAFii_XidiCTl7zKAPiK5p16TodkTQyxF0u4Kw/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t3/h001.jwu5ebvBRqxjiv4h_2cumLTIF_p-aYehdRHGDxQ_i3g
Caption: 

In case you?re new to AI, no worries. In addition to our daily newsletter, we also have a free course to help you learn how to use AI tools at work. You?ll also be able to apply for a certification at the end of the course.

You?ll learn how to use ChatGPT, create presentations with Gamma, generate images with Midjourney, analyze and visualize data with AI, and much more.

_**[Take the course and get certified](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.tLO9pzLKcxr3ShVlu4P0Gqas-4_GK4TemjeqspXeWPG3lU5Am4FNe4HFBEaCd8XYcfH36peNE1nWiWNiLk_TT8zKa52WUlkR5yYOEF2qVStSyPLTsElRu1atwXMGGpoML4uO9lE5_sNK_h1P1GAPNnuHqR3H4r4LZL3ZBP6DTGs2ykAt6X9iY6GDMbEMX71XgGOJP_70lIJRa_ARuufal4If59ngsno1UbpIxs8hglM23z62dX4j6PmaRmY9KCKXw61RmSnhgO6-LVeqi0nYkzuwMn_LL5AT6soA1Q11bAT4aTdpKHCNgE4TCVW6JEms/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t4/h001.0nmYYe2jaGo8udZvgV7ju9Miqi1VbXhXaEDsEKCSmRc

???????????????????????????

### **Other Resources**

* [1,000+ ChatGPT Prompts](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.QR8PDET7GVRZS9oWC_jpgH-qigySh3hAoVuoVNaPnGW2teE_6srvsO0WRO7pT0WoGPTpUuPH43DtreLclEB-Uw/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t5/h001.tWoz8uITt7lxq3dA19pc8x2x_WPtA36qctcvjClX4Z4

* **[222+ prompts for Engineers](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.QR8PDET7GVRZS9oWC_jpgH-qigySh3hAoVuoVNaPnGXa9IGuHXX7fS30TssGsoTS4oOC6TCtRptKMk0stI_j-w/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t6/h001.PpgH7F_AmLYK8Zx35nE_CohfiesWhmS5iP_7y6NE4fY

* [300+ Ultimate AI Tools](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.QR8PDET7GVRZS9oWC_jpgH-qigySh3hAoVuoVNaPnGVi7EKVTM5TPaSSD6L7KZAOJNq8hW1oNZ6riJrdtxbFnw/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t7/h001.swwEeRbyLXqZMRd_zZh-8joQlONBufo9HMsUEAY--Kw

* [ChatGPT for Beginners](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.QR8PDET7GVRZS9oWC_jpgH-qigySh3hAoVuoVNaPnGXu3ltJK4iyrn94NelQt8elKpWorsSNK_HO2qTPHZt0yA/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t8/h001.tsTP-YmJ2-z1vxP1cFFhrw2T62tt6taGszRLWVrl62Y

* [Prompting Cheat Sheet](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.QR8PDET7GVRZS9oWC_jpgH-qigySh3hAoVuoVNaPnGUf35CxbONrRvLJJI1WwtAU_toaba5r_iUPtx-FjZ1hwQ/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t9/h001.HbaIdOjpdVnJmVV1L4QhLcV7sz5tBE4OIgBydL1o2Pw

* [More Cheat Sheets](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.c3bwGki9gHo3r1zoMYsk5PnZ7Wfm0MqiaurtkC0BlfS12wZoNsqcw9nW9qMLyEMXFIg5hgBEs8H6BRmgnrZsUBHVO2vwipnNbN0aua7ruoY/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t10/h001.RQyYrKde58eUzCeSzGvzcnI3T4qummo-KHDic__Z03o

???????????????????????????

Thanks for signing up. Please don?t forget to reply to this email and move it from your Promotions folder to your main inbox if you want to keep receiving more resources like these. 

I'm excited to have you here!

[Zain](https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.cbTlTBbOm0oxrOJrFZNEqc6jwbyUdOF1TTNAgEezYr40-oUpAS4uoVFtMleWbppD/4kd/nF6gtwJvT4m2NfgY-HDOGQ/t11/h001.uCU12IDHy3-K0017D0OEHzAs-dMndZyvCW5rnct6aG0

subject: Welcome to AI Weekly ? We are thrilled to have you
text:
Thanks for subscribing. If somehow you ended up here by accident scroll to the bottom to unsubscribe. 

If you?re here to?

* Weekly Business AI News Right to your Inbox

* Sound smart at a party

* Impress your boss

* Automate your life

* Make your friends go ?How did you to that!? 

* Staying up to date on all things A.I

?Then you?re in the right place.

**Here?s why:**

AI Weekly and our team work tirelessly to get the edge on the latest news and AI tools before they begin trending. We study the world?s best AI startups, content creators, and media companies ? and share their tools and tactics with you right in your inbox and across other mediums. 

Before we get into those learnings, do me a quick favor? Can you move this email to your primary inbox? See the screengrab below: 

View image: (https://link.mail.beehiiv.com/ss/c/u001.-kzqWNr-f6qY-eqJ47GVDxGG7SreY3mwjiU7CiCmL5t9Yih86halij_F5x70F3hc_4mFlc-12YL-risbBO3vW28leAWPSXWUUOo9--ZaJ6sS4eBZKbBmBpovqpyJDY0qwdDaUO2z5x7LnFh7p-oavq98km4_Ig98jYEijW98SCzwZVmh4hEHa6MDx6goesWckokeISCj3IH5SmP4tZuW2r6_k4kbssMIHzlfcFkP3z3oMDWmyEPagAbjEwDR6hxj/4kd/QLAqRLkSRyaStKS-llQW1g/t0/h001.HvISQUu3pm9i7sVBq72eS4GxF9dsVIE8Tlk4klapW7w
Caption: 

## **Here's what to expect from the newsletter**

* Our **Weekly Newsletter** on Monday Morings featuring longer form analysis of everything that has happened in the last weekin A.I

* _**Tips and tricks Tuesday: **_right to your inbox. Every once and a while we?ll send out an email with different tips and tricks on how to use A.I to better your life. 

* **Prompt Wednesday: **Prompts and prompting guides right to your inbox. 

* **Top A.I Tools and A.I best practices sent to you throughout the week. **

* _**Friyay Five:**_ A quick email sent every Friday summarizing all the top stories in A.I for the week. 

* **Breaking A.I News. **

* **Product Hunt: **We are always on the lookout for the best tools in the A.I space and how they can improve your life. We will build out guides and send them right to you inbox. 

So, gear up, my friend. "AI Weekly" isn't just a newsletter; it's your front-row ticket to the greatest show in technology.

One favor to ask: Can you reply with a ? or a ?Yes? to let me know you got this email? We?ll also send you a link to free AI resources and ChatGPT Prompts. 

(You can also tell me a little bit more about yourself and what you are working on at the moment)

Looking forward to getting to know you better!

Your Pal Josh

Stay Knowledgeable, Stay Dangerous 



PS - If you have a friend that would like the newsletter feel free to share it with them. They will love you for it.

subject: Action required: please confirm your subscription to The Morning Merge newsletter
text:

Caption: 

----------
**Confirm your subscription**

You signed up to receive?The Morning Merge?but, before we make this official, just want to make sure you know what you're getting into.

We send an email 2x a week with curated insights on the important news in AI, tech, and business. Kind of like if your smart (and good looking) friend read the internet all day and then summarized what you needed to know.

Ok, so -- you ready for this? If so, click the button below and we'll add you to the list. Otherwise, ignore this email and you won't hear from us again.


----------Confirm Subscription (https://elinkaf9.morningmerge.com/ss/c/u001.2wP_C4bVc5boqLuPjPJYNl7uKPa2x9Zal64eAropBk9_CXI5SAqio8mMTEi80zUbhvjXO0F_cHImev98_f9AuViaHjC7LgMu5VlxWWmNBZ8hoHFuctQxVcWfGHRm1RVGIIpGUfdFzUTjjw6-fX95wIbrG3qkBULCkcNqOmxSqvurRacvI_OGwmZYLqDiYFp9Ht3k-HvrlkNEkyzO3kMD9wSF9Otn85zZQxQrcIKentqjsTIhPW9lfkLXYPJk1SrrDsQhU9tIDl-PR5dvH8cRJdOPOtrSzrLO9tsYTYgKvKhT2tOToyGfkI_d42r3x0qNMz-gRxDcqTK2gE4o-p8Kf1BvzIFG9AsbbXnCEGVzP74/4kd/rqKWSlEUTriKZ7bPEpMpyQ/t2/h001.ianALq59_EVjdhBbTKq_f9FOZ3BcnW4ReX2L6YlFGWo
